metadata.title: CVE-2021-26313 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Potential speculative code store bypass in all supported CPU products, inconjunction with software vulnerabilities relating to speculative executionof overwritten instructions, may cause an incorrect speculation and couldresult in data leakage.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
